title: Textile, 19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved copper plate on plain weave
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 172 x 30.5 cm (5 ft. 7 11/16 in. x 12 in.)
description: Scenic pattern in red - piece A from the left third and piece B from the right third. The pattern arranged in two alternating repeating bands divided by swags and floral garlands. The scenic bands depict dancing in the center areas with spectators in theatre boxes at left and right of fabric completed when fabric lengths places side by side.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 19th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved copper plate on plain weave. 1973-25-13-b.
